name: Project Chase - Mousejam2
description:
PROJECT CHASE

Made for mousejam2

(SCROLL TAP) - Change movement mapping Walking/Jumping.

(LMB | Walking) - Walk left.

(RMB | Walking) - Walk right.

(LMB hold and release  | Jumping) - Jump left.

(RMB hold and release  | Jumping) - Jump right.

(------------------SAVING POSITION------------------)

(SCROLL hold 1 second) - Save player position.

(LMB tap twice) - Go back to saved position.
